a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of cities, towns and suburbs, and rural areas, 1975 to 2030
The European Commission combines satellite imagery with national census data to identify cities, towns and
suburbs, and rural areas and estimate their respective populations.
Data source: European Commission, Joint Research Centre (JRC) (2023)
